From:

To: Nathan NYSD Chambers
Cc: 
Christian Everdell 
Bobbi Sternheim ,'Laura 
Menninger' "Jeff Pagliuca" 
Subject: US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Government Opposition to Defense Motions 
Date: Sat, 27 Feb 2021 04:20:19 +0000 
Attachments: Brief Exhibits.zip; 2021-02-26_GM_Government_pre-
trial_opposition_cover_letter (final).pdf; PROPOSED_REDACTIONS_-
2021.02.26 Government Omnibus_Opposition_to_Maxwell_Defense_Motions_FINAL.pd 
2021.02.26_Govemment_Omnibus_Opposition_to_Maxwell_Defense_Motions_FINAL_U 
NREDACTED.pdf 
Good evening, 
Attached please find the Government's omnibus memorandum of law in opposition to the defense's pretrial motions in 
the above-referenced case. Also attached is a zip file containing the exhibits to the memorandum, as well as a cover 
letter. The cover letter has been filed on ECF, and the Government requests that the remaining filings be accepted 
temporarily under seal. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00011518
